an7.62:1.2: yadidaṃ puññāni → yadidaṃ puññanti (bj); yadidaṃ puññānanti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, csp1ed)
an7.62:1.3: bhikkhave, dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ puññānaṃ dīgharattaṃ iṭṭhaṃ → bhikkhave dīgharattaṃ iṭṭhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed), bhikkhave dīgharattaṃ puññānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ (?)
an7.62:2.7: ajjhāvasinti → ajjhāvasati (si, mr); ajjhāvasanti (cck, sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an7.62:10.2: pathabyo me na vipajjati → puthavyo yena vuccati (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an7.62:12.1: attakāmena → atthakāmena (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
